alerts.description:
SVRAMA

The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southwestern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas...
Southeastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas...

* Until 930 PM CDT.

* At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of
Hereford, moving southeast at 20 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible.
Hail damage to vehicles is expected.

* Locations impacted include...
Hereford, Dawn, and Buffalo Lake.
alerts.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:26PM CDT until August 11 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo TX

alerts.area_desc: Childress, TX; Cottle, TX; Hall, TX
alerts.description:
SVRLUB

The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southwestern Childress County in the Panhandle of Texas...
Northern Cottle County in northwestern Texas...
Southeastern Hall County in the Panhandle of Texas...

* Until 930 PM CDT.

* At 842 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 4 miles northeast of Northfield to 5 miles southwest
of Swearingen, moving east at 15 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage
to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Tell, Swearingen, and Cee Vee.
alerts.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:42PM CDT until August 11 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Lubbock TX

alerts.description:
TORDMX

The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northwestern Davis County in southeastern Iowa...
East central Appanoose County in south central Iowa...

* Until 945 PM CDT.

* At 918 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located over Moulton, or 10 miles east of Centerville, moving
northeast at 25 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Lake Wapello State Park around 925 PM CDT.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lake
Wapello State Park, Bloomfield Municipal Airport, Drakesville, and
Moulton.
alerts.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 11 at 9:18PM CDT until August 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Des Moines IA

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northeastern Kingsbury County in east central South Dakota...
Western Brookings County in east central South Dakota...

* At 904 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Badger, or 10
miles southeast of Bryant, moving southeast at 40 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* This severe thunderstorm will be near...

Oakwood State Park around 920 PM CDT.

Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Volga
and Sinai.

alerts.description:
SVRMPX

The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northern Stevens County in west central Minnesota...

* Until 945 PM CDT.

* At 901 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Donnelly, or
13 miles northwest of Morris, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail.

SOURCE...Trained spotters reported.

IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect
damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles.

* This severe thunderstorm will be near...
Donnelly around 910 PM CDT.
Morris around 925 PM CDT.

Other locations impacted by the severe thunderstorm include Fish
Lake.
alerts.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:01PM CDT until August 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Twin Cities/Chanhassen MN

alerts.description:
At 848 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong
thunderstorms extending from 16 miles north of Hewitt to 15 miles
north of Carlos, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around
unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible.

Locations impacted include...
Staples, Browerville, Clarissa, Eagle Bend, Bertha, Hewitt and
Philbrook.
alerts.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:48PM CDT by NWS Twin Cities/Chanhassen MN

around unsecured objects.

Locations in or near the path include...

Stanley...                        Sardis...
Clayton...

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow
around unsecured objects.

Locations in or near the path include...

Dyer...                           Kibler...
Mountainburg...                   Central City...
Blackburn...                      Rye Hill...
Milltown...                       Winslow...
Lee Creek...                      Fort Smith...
Locke...                          Mount Gayler...
Excelsior...                      Fort Smith Regional Airport...
Van Buren...                      Ursula...
Rudy...                           Lavaca...

This includes the following highways,

Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14.
Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 46.

alerts.description:
At 943 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near
Sparr, or 8 miles southwest of Citra, moving northwest at 25 mph.

HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding
due to heavy rainfall.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around
unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is
possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible.

Locations impacted include...
Sparr, Cross Creek, Rochelle, Micanopy, Reddick, McIntosh,
Flemington, and Lowell.

alerts.area_desc: Hemphill, TX; Lipscomb, TX; Ochiltree, TX; Roberts, TX
alerts.description:
SVRAMA

The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas...
Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas...
Northwestern Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas...
Southern Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas...

* Until 945 PM CDT.

* At 844 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles southwest
of Wolf Creek Park, or 21 miles southeast of Spearman, moving south
at 15 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible.
Hail damage to vehicles is expected.

* This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of
southwestern Lipscomb, Roberts, northwestern Hemphill and southern
Ochiltree Counties.
alerts.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:44PM CDT until August 11 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo TX
